mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, t1.owner_id, t1.create_ts, (case when t1.owner_id = #{userId} then 1 else 0 end) as editFlag from t_okr_teams t1 left join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.team_id=t1.id where t1.type='2' and t2.user_id= #{userId}

select t1.id, t1.name, t1.owner_id, t1.create_ts from t_okr_teams t1
AND t1.type='2'
and t1.owner_id= #{userId}
and t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{teamName }, '%')

select t1.id, t1.user_name, t1.real_name, t1.photo_url from t_okr_sys_user t1 join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.user_id = t1.id where t2.team_id = #{teamId} and t1.id != (select owner_id from t_okr_teams where id = #{teamId})

select t1.id, t1.user_name, t1.real_name, t1.photo_url from t_okr_sys_user t1 join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.user_id = t1.id where t2.team_id = #{teamId} and t1.id != (select owner_id from t_okr_teams where id = #{teamId})
select t1.id, t1.name, t1.owner_id from t_okr_teams t1 left join t_okr_manage_object_team_rela t2 on t2.team_id=t1.id where t2.object_id= #{objectId}
